name: Find the Idol
description:
Welcome to Find the Idol!

You must use your parkour skills to traverse the level, dispose of the idol with your hammer, and find an escape! Will you do so successfully?

Controls:

WASD - Movement 

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

L Ctrl - Crouch

W + A/D and touching a wall - Wall run

Left Click - Swing hammer

By: Sukhraj Ricky Singh Boall
